tokens.text: represents a single generator output entry

title: Info Set Item
description: Single entry from the generator output feed.

fields.title: Item Type
fields.description: Numeric discriminator identifying the kind of item entry.

fields.title: Group Id
fields.description: Identifier of the generator group responsible for this entry.

fields.title: Group Index
fields.description: Requirement or message code as emitted by the generator.

fields.title: Path
fields.description: Optional path that contextualises the item entry.

fields.title: Data
fields.description: Supplemental data emitted with the item. Can be a string or an array of numbers.

alternates.description: Numeric tuple representation when the generator emits version triples or coordinates.

fields.title: Message
fields.description: Human readable context for the entry.

fields.title: Feature Sets
fields.description: Optional keyed metrics attached to this item entry.
